name: Protect The Pillars
description:
For ScoreSpace Jam #17 (https://itch.io/jam/scorejam17)

Enemies are coming for your sacred pillars. Stop them!

Dash into enemies to destroy them

Score is based off enemies destroyed, remaining pillars, and total remaining pillar health at the end of the time limit

Note: This game is far better played with a controller

Controls:

  • Move: Left Control Stick or W / A / S / D
  • Dash: Right Bumper or Space Bar

Packages used:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/jammo-character-mix-and-jam-... - Jammo Model + animations
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/kinematic-character-controll... - Character controller motor
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-ultimate-pack-54733 - Low poly assets
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/quibli-anime-shaders-and-tools-203178 - Shaders
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5... - Click sound

Other assets:

  • https://freesound.org/people/nsstudios/sounds/321102/ - Dash sound
  • https://uppbeat.io/t/infraction/ultraviolet - Background music (License code: GUYW3FKEXT9ZXQSZ)
